General.Name: Shandong Hiking International Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Shandong Hiking International Co.,Ltd operates in trading business in China and internationally. The company offers hair products, textiles, clothing, and garment products, as well as the cross-border import e-commerce business. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Qingdao, China.

2.Name: Ms. Zhaojie  Meng
2.Title: VP, Director & Sec. of the Board
